offerings.name: Stone Altar
quotes: Return to where it all began. It'll make sense, in time.
Back to the beggining, one can always start again.
Fear not being lost. You'll eventually reach your goals.
At the center of the world, we welcome you.
Fortunate is the adventurer that remember its origins.

offerings.name: Haldor
quotes: Fancy a bit of dwarven charm? Come see me in the forests.
I've got just the thing to make your day brighter. I'm waiting for you.
Well, well, well! Looks like we've got a visitor. Come to my shop!
Well, look who's dropped by! I'm open for business, and your timing is spot on.
Hey there, wanderer! My little shop is always open to folks like you.

offerings.name: Hildir
quotes: I'm sensing a new face. How are your adventure going?
Greetings, seeker of quests! I got a feeling today's your day.
Come to me, and maybe you'll find something you fancy in the stock.
Seeking treasures or just a friendly chat? Either way, you're in good company.
Well, well, well! A fresh face looking for my little corner of the world.

offerings.name: Eikthyr
quotes: Across the meadows, mortal eyes gaze. What business do you have with the lord of these lands?
Beneath the open sky, you observe. Why do you disturb the peace of these meadows?
Meadow's edge, your gaze intrudes. What brings you to my presence?
The breeze carries hints of your distant gaze. Why do you disrupt the serenity of these open fields?
Through the tall grass, your eyes betray your curiosity. State your intent, seeker.

offerings.name: Elder
quotes: Far beyond the woods, a watcher stands. Why do you gaze upon me?
Through the trees, your intent is blurred. What compels you to approach?
Your presence is known to me, human. Why do you seek me out?
The wind carries whispers of your approach. Speak, seeker, and reveal your intent.
In the shadows, you watch. Intruder, why do you seek the spirit of the forest?

offerings.name: Bonemass
quotes: Step forth, intruder. Become the prey of my insatiable appetite.
Come, make yourself known, and let me extend my invitation to your demise.
What dark quest compels you? The swamp awaits, eager to welcome you into the eternal night.
In murky depths, a distant observer emerges. Step forth and accept your fate: Death.
Eager to meet your destiny? As you sense my presence, I sense yours.

offerings.name: Moder
quotes: Your contraptions betray your intrusion, wanderer. What folly drives you to unveil the dragon queen?
Let the skies resound with our roars, and our scales shimmer in the frozen light. You won't survive.
The ice mountains are attuned to your every move. We feel you. We see you.
Atop the world, you seek the dragon queen. You will find me, but you will not succeed.
How foolish you are to seek me. You are not the first, you will not be the last.

offerings.name: Yagluth
quotes: Do you hope to find me, or do you yearn for the embrace of the shadows?
Foolish wanderer. You navigate the dark, guided by misguided courage.
The shadows whisper of your approach. Come to your inevitable demise.
Prepare for decay's welcome, for here, life surrenders to the inevitable.
The stench of the living invades my domain. What do you hope to accomplish here?

offerings.name: Queen
quotes: The vibrations of your intrusion reach my chambers. What draws you into the heart of the hive?
Recognize the amalgamation of cunning and might standing before you. Your attempts are futile.
You stand on the precipice of my nest. What purpose guides you to challenge the Queen?
Witness the symbiotic prowess embodied in my form. You are not prepared to face me.
The scent of your arrival is spreading. You will be a feast for the hive. Come!
